it.polimi.se2019.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player contains all the player data, and related collections (eg: Inventory)

        Move the player in the specified direction

      • respawn

        public void respawn(Square spawnPoint)
        Bring the player back into the game : set damage to 0, draw a power up card, discard a power up card and spawn in the spawn point of the card's equivalent ammo colour
        Parameters:
        spawnPoint - the spawn square on which to respawn, possible values are map.getRedSpawnPoint map.getBlueSpawnPoint map.getYellowSpawnPoint
